data.eml:eml: Megastigmus seed chalcids (Hymenoptera, Torymidae) radiated much more on Angiosperms than previously considered. I- Description of 8 new species from Kenya, with a key to the females of Eastern and Southern Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roques, Alain, Copeland, Robert S., Soldati, Laurent, Denux, Olivier, Auger-Rozenberg, Marie-Anne (2016): Megastigmus seed chalcids (Hymenoptera, Torymidae) radiated much more on Angiosperms than previously considered. I- Description of 8 new species from Kenya, with a key to the females of Eastern and Southern Africa. ZooKeys 585: 51-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.585.7503, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.585.7503
